eng.title: JUAN CARLOS CRUZ CHACON
eng.description: Hello I am passionate software developer, with experience in Front-End and Back-End development. I specialize in creating websites that offer a unique and satisfactory user experience, implementing good practices, architectures and programming patterns to ensure the quality and efficiency of my projects. I take pride in analyzing requirements in detail and estimating the time needed to complete activities accurately. I am a self-taught person, responsible and committed to my work. I am always looking to learn new technologies and tools to continually improve my skills and stay up to date in the field of software development.
eng.name: NAME
